name: Aswang
description:
Aswang is a short horror game featuring creatures from Filipino folklore.

Gameplay: The game is focused on exploration with occasional First-Person Shooting segments

Controls

-Movement: WASD

-Look Around: Mouse

-Interact: E or Left Click

-Quick Turn: Q

-Aim: Right Click

-Shoot: Right Click + Left Click

-Reload: R

-Switch Weapon: 1 and 2
